hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) took a silver ring and had 'Muhammad, the Apostle' of Allah' engraved on it. The Prophet then said (to us), 'I have a silver ring with 'Muhammad, the Messenger of Allah engraved on it, so none of you should have the same engraving on his ring

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم " لاَ يَنْقُشُ عَلَى نَقْشِ خَاتَمِهِ ".
chapter.eng-name: "None should have the same engraving made on his ring as the engraving on my ring."
